articles.description: Aaron Grandidier Nkanang was born and raised in London, but his rugby life has taken a twisting route to Olympic rugby gold with France.

articles.description: Celtic must find a way to win - and win ugly if necessary - as they begin their Champions League campaign, writes Tom English.
